author: Carl_C_Icahn
content: 1/3 Unfortunately, my warning concerning the imminent exodus of many of our best companies is coming true.

author: Carl_C_Icahn
content: 2/3 Today Pfizer confirmed they are planning to move out of the country. The situation is much more dangerous than most people believe.

author: Carl_C_Icahn
content: 3/3 There is no reason Congress cannot act now to pass international tax reform with the Highway Bill.Read my letter https://t.co/fbbB8mNWMR
